website_summaries.verdict: A mid-priced sprinkler known for its nice features but also some durability concerns.
pros: Produces spray capable of reaching 32.8 feet
with its trio of 360-degree rotating arms and 80 psi
Easy to operate and reasonably quiet
Falls in the middle of the price range
cons: A few owners report broken pieces with normal use

customer_reviews.title: Great defense against annoying neighbors
customer_reviews.text: Way better construction than the typical waving sprinkler you can find at hardware stores. This thing is hilarious - when you turn it on, it spins REALLY fast and launches water an incredible distance! My yard is small, granted, but it still covers the entire thing. The neighbor kids have a bad habit of playing in my yard and tromping on my flowerbed regardless of how many times I've addressed the issue, so whenever I see them coming now I just turn this sprinkler on and they can't dodge it fast enough. It's the best.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Mabry

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this sprinkler, at first use I was happy with the water flow and the distance the water covered. However after only 2 uses,one of black sprinkler heads popped off and broke, made of plastic .
customer_reviews.author: E N

customer_reviews.title: Update- 5/19
customer_reviews.text: First off- the company was great to work with! I was able to snap the "arm" that came off and use the sprinkler. I like the coverage and small to very large area it covers. I think a dab of super glue will be useful so arms don't snap off.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Leaks a lot, not a fan of the design
customer_reviews.text: The y-shaped sprinkler piece screws into the base and rotates from water pressure. It had a very bad leak from this joint. Additionally, there was a wad of plastic stuck in the sprinkler blocking the water flow. The pressure was so high out of the nozzles that there wasn't a defined spray pattern. It sprayed all over the house on one side and the fence on the other. It was either too much or too little. I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: KevinA

customer_reviews.title: Junk, doesn't water thoroughly.
customer_reviews.text: I was initially pleased with this product because it seemed to have a far reach until the surrounding grass died, leaving just a ring of green. The water doesn't hit the 3-4 feet closest to the sprinkler. Then I went to move it this morning (since you have to keep moving it to be sure everything is watered) and found that the sprinkler heads just popped off, one even broke off! I feel I wasted my money and should've just went with the more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crap Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This does water in a 360 ring, but everything in a 6ft circle around the sprinkler gets no water at all. I literally have a lush lawn everywhere except in 6 ft circles around the sprinklers because they overshoot and are poorly designed. Unfortunately I didnt notice this until the grass started dying from no water and my return window has closed, awesome. Crap product.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Bananahammock

customer_reviews.title: Average water sprinkler.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to water sod in our front lawn. It is a light weight sprinkler. Arrived quickly and in one piece. It does work. Kinda flimsy where it attaches to water hose. Might even break if it sits out in the sun to long but haven’t had it long enough to review it. I’d be careful when attaching it to the hose as it is plastic and the threads may not hold up over time. Water doesn’t reach close to the sprinkler so you need to move it a lot to reach all areas. Personally next time I would invest in something more sturdy that has better coverage.
customer_reviews.author: C GIGANDET

customer_reviews.title: Coverage area is minimal - watering is inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I have a good sized yard so I was disappointed that the radius seems to be only about 5 feet in diameter (IF THAT!) from the center. What is worse is that the water does not seem to really land equally. It spins very fast so may that affects where it is landing. But I had it on one area for 15 minutes and parts of the coverage area were still bone dry. I wish I had chosen a different one.
customer_reviews.author: McLean mom

customer_reviews.title: Oh so quiet!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy waters well!! One thing I really liked about it was how quiet it was. I tried a few other sprinklers with adjustable spray heads they just didn’t water evenly and were so noisy. It’s a big deal when you have a whole lawn to water for weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lawson 929

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW IT BROKE IN WITHIN FOUR MONTHS !
customer_reviews.text: Its very sturdy, better than the ones you get a Home Depot. What I like best is that it projects the water on very thin and even amount so that you don't get puddles. Its only negative is that it does not cover a large area. ITS A SHAME BECUASE IT DID HAVE A NICE DISPERSAL , BUT IT STOP SPINNING AFTER ONLY FOUR MONTHS A LIGHT USAGE. IF YOU GO THROUGH THE REVIEWS A GOOD DEAL OF PEOPLE HAVE THE SAME SOMPLAINT,
customer_reviews.author: domenick f. toscani

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 1/2 months
customer_reviews.text: We've had this thing for two and a half months and it is already falling apart. It worked great at first but now it doesn't spin, and several pieces have fallen off. We've used it 11 times. Very disappointing purchase
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa B

customer_reviews.title: Two for two now broken
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked this sprinkler, and I bought a second one to have for both front and back yards. I didn’t get around to unboxing the second one until today after having it for two years, and it broke immediately! Two of the spray arm Nozzles popped off when I turned it on the first time, and would not stay on when reattached. The first sprinkler lasted for two seasons, but now just stops spinning after a few minutes of operation and worked for a little while after being lubricated but quits after about 10 minutes. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: tmac57

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprinkler!!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described very easy to use and the adjustability makes it easy to hit various spots in my yard. All you have to do is change the angle of the nozzles. I like it because it really does kind of simulate rain. It doesn’t spray too hard or overwater a certain area.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler that is sturdy and covers a lot of ground
customer_reviews.text: This product is just what I was looking for. If you need a sprinkler that covers a lot of ground and is easy to use this is a great product. In my pictures I’ve provided show how this product looks and in one of the photos you can see water flying through the air. The sprinkler covered approx 200 sq ft of my back lawn. I highly recommend this product if you are looking for a sturdy product that covers a lot of ground.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel B.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get everything you paid for!
customer_reviews.text: This little sprinkler works great at getting into places where you need 360 coverage. I ordered two of these and noticed one had silver bars on the bottom, making it weighted and giving it a very sturdy feel while the other one did not come with the silver bars. I ended up hitting my non weighted one on a raised flower bed and it broke so bad I can’t use it. This is a solid product if you get the weights in the bottom of it. If not, I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: uneven coverage
customer_reviews.text: purchased this to water a 30' circular area. the good news is the ability to control volume and spread. The sprinkler, although very light weight, stays relatively well put where you place it. The bad news is that it leaves a big dry patch close to the sprinkler while watering everything else further out. I've tinkered with the controls and eliminated some of this problem (the sprinkler head can be adjusted) but the watering volume is uneven across the total area.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money for Me
customer_reviews.text: Two of these sprinklers were a waste of money for any yard larger than a patio home patch of grass. It is too restrictive in trying to get different areas of yard. Limited options to spray. It doesn't span very far for large yards. It even distribution is nice feature but takes forever to water. I dislike it so much, I am already searching for a different kind and just call this a loss.
customer_reviews.author: LAG

customer_reviews.title: Can’t control the flow
customer_reviews.text: I do not like that I can’t control how and where the water goes. You have to control the water flow with the faucet. It covers a large area if the water is open all the way and a smaller area of open only a little. Forget about moving it once it’s on. You will get wet. I need different sections of the yard watered and it’s a pain going out and moving it knowing you will get soaked. I will return this item and look for something different.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Really not a great product - at least for us. It spins much too fast - it just throws water straight up around it. We can reduce this by lowering the water pressure - but, even then, it has very little range and does not evenly distribute water. Plus, with low pressure, much less water passes through it. It is also very annoying not to be able to maneuver it without kinking or turning off the water. Much better options of sprinklers out there - will maybe use this one as a pass-through for the vegetable garden in the back - hopefully, this at least works.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ruud

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how well this unit works. When I took it out of the box, I expected it will not last long, because it is made out of plastic and has moving parts. We’ve used it almost daily for several months and it woks and looks as new. Most sprinklers I’ve used before tend to fail or deteriorate fairly quickly, but not this one. It spreads the water pretty evenly and the coverage radius is probably around 30-40ft.
customer_reviews.author: Mizu

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Over all I can see why this has high ratings. But I must have missed the part that you will get wet attempting to move this unless the water is totally off. That is the reason for 4*. I also wish it covered a larger area but that could be our water pressure, hose, etc. For our garden home yard this works in certain sections since the HOA frowns on us watering our neighbors yard, the street, etc. It is sturdy, well made and I recommend it for certain size lawns.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Fowler Lawson

customer_reviews.title: this sprinkler is great for what we were needing it for
customer_reviews.text: So far, this sprinkler is great for what we were needing it for. It showers water evenly and we are very pleased with it. We live right next to the beach so we tried staying away from buying a sprinkler with metal. Well this sprinkler is all thick plastic and seems to be built well (:
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie L. Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler for a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this light-weight sprinkler. I didn't expect it to be too effective because it was so light in weight and the cost was so low. I was very wrong in my expectations of the product. The sprinkler constantly turns a full 360 degrees and doses an excellent job of soaking my lawn and flowers. Very pleased with the product and would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a good value for his/her money.
customer_reviews.author: S Pilgreen

customer_reviews.title: Among similar designs this works well for me, recommended!
customer_reviews.text: After reading many negative views I became sceptical. Arrived. Changed angle adj. to most level. Large circle, quiet, and best? About ONE FT defines in and outside of watered area! Vary circle size by water pressure, precisely. And the price is Chinese! Some areas still need a retangle, large. For lots of corner, lawn and flowers, this is ideal and no over reach if carefully set. Four stars for weight? Stupid, weight is good for stable positioning. Too new to know long term functioning. There are many copies of originals. This one is excellent within it's circular limitation, adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: B. Speer

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: Planted new grass seed and needed a sprinkler. At first we loved it, but only lasted us three weeks of use. Our sprinkler broke at the base were it spins some how and that is it! Worked great while it lasted but not to durable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kwiatkowski

customer_reviews.title: I liked it so much I tried to order another one ...
customer_reviews.text: This sprinkler works very well. Compared to the traditional sprinkler it covers the ground with water in all areas of its path. I liked it so much I tried to order another one and it was not available through Amazon. I ordered a similar product and it was cheaply made and did not cover the ground as well. While I cannot determine the footage of spray it does a fantastic job. It has saved a huge amount of time watering. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well after cleaning
customer_reviews.text: When we first turned it on, it worked for about 30 seconds and then completely stopped all but two of the water streams. We took the pieces off that hold the holes and could see debris in there. So we took a needle and poked all of them out until the debris was all gone. Was tedious work but took only about 5 minutes. Then we snapped them back on, hooked up the hose again and it worked like a charm!! The kids loved it (I used it for summer fun when the grandkids came to visit) and the lawn got watered, lol. Win-win!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do 3600 square ft
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is great except for the fact that it definitely doesn't cover 3600 sq ft. I bought it specifically because it was advertised as doing more than others but was disappointed to find it was a much smaller area.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Pornelos

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item after reading the great rating from other customers, but this item was a waste of money for us. We purchased this item this summer and finally used it this past week only to have both of them break after the first time. To be specific, the rotating nozzle body pops off due to the the plastic pieces not being sustainable. I was thinking it was a one off, but when it happened to both of the sprinklers I purchased I knew it was the product manufacturing and not this specific item. Extremely disappointing. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed with this Sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: This sprinkler does a Wonderful Job!! With the weights on the bottom the sprinkler stays where you put it. It covers a good size area with "rain soaking" water which I believe is better than conventional sprinklers. Depending on how dry the soil has become it takes anywhere from 15-35 minutes for my lawn to be watered adequately. You can hook the hose up and adjust the sprinkler heads easily. It is also light weight and easy to store. This is everything I was look for in a sprinkler. Very Impressed and would Highly Recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Nievar

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t go the distance.
customer_reviews.text: I would say this is a decent sprinkler. Would be a lot of fun for children to run through. I am mostly disappointed by the fact that it says it can cover over 3000 sq feet. At most that it will cover is maybe 300 sq feet. You can change the angle straight up and it has some wispiness that might spray farther but it’s not consistent. It’s a decent sprinkler but I would not normally pay $20 for something like this when I could buy a $10 one that does probably just as good if not better of a job distance wise.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: Ordered another one
customer_reviews.text: I got to use it for one day. It did exactly what I needed it to do. Unfortunately on the morning of the next day, I dropped it onto the bricks on its head and broke the wheel off. I went right in and ordered another one and will be more careful. UPDATE: second one arrived quickly. Set it up and put it to use right away. It is perfect for small and large areas. Rotates well even when I set it at a low pressure/space setting.
customer_reviews.author: thayer brown

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to use andI only wonder if they have considered ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got a chance to try this sprinkler. It's easy to use andI only wonder if they have considered actually lowering the deflection angle for narrower applications...This does work fine and is of course I only need to adjust the flow/pressure for those narrower areas.
customer_reviews.author: Larry-Bob

customer_reviews.title: It sprays water evenly for at least 20 feet or greater.
customer_reviews.text: It's good to watch and it gets the water pretty even over a 20' circle or better. I just keep a hose straight and after 20 minutes pull it toward me 20 feet and I no longer need a sprinkler system put in like the last house I owned. The kids are renting it and love the system I put in but this sprinkler eliminates that need. Our soil is a black dirt nearly clay and it holds water for a long period. That is why I purchased this sprinkler as it is perfect for our yard, keeping it dark green.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sprinkler. I actually bought it to entertain my kids and they said its the "best sprinkler ever". The sprinkler covers a large area of the grass, so you will not have an issue watering your grass, if that's what you are using it for. I'm very happy with this purchase. Price is great and quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Budonaro

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal with a cloth hose
customer_reviews.text: We have the hose that retracts when water is not flowing. So, trying to reach it to the middle of the yard when it’s off is a struggle because it will bounce back. We have to move it while it’s on, while the hose it at it’s full length to reach all parts of our yard. Better use for the typical hose.
customer_reviews.author: TA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Comes in two pieces and all you need to do is screw it together.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Broke the first time we used it
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that an essential piece broke the first time I used it and made it so the top popped off completely, instead of rotating the head. My handy spouse was able to superglue the piece back together, but gluing it did change how the water sprays. I wouldn't recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: mcvickie

customer_reviews.title: good and bad
customer_reviews.text: This sprinkler is light weight which makes moving it easy. I like that the directionals have water going in multiple directions. However, I feel the watering is too "light." By this I mean that only light amount of water go in each place in the year. This means you have to leave the sprinkler on longer, IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: Sprinkler results like rain
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly drenching sprinkler. It spins quickly and keeps up with whatever water pressure you have to drive it. Because it spins quickly and never leaves a watering gap, the falling water behaves like actual rain. Plants receiving intermittent watering from other kinds of sprinklers (and we have used many in our little gardens) never quite have the same level of perkiness and strength. The GrowGreen sprinkler is excellent if you have good water pressure to make it spin and drench!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Bathory-Kitsz

customer_reviews.title: Good  product
customer_reviews.text: This is great for what I was looking for: watering the lawn and for the kids to get wet. The water shoots out while going in a circle and has a ‘softer’ feeling when the kids run through it, as opposed to the ones that shoot it straight in the sky and going back and forth. It also waters the grass in the process!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Schuerger

customer_reviews.title: Inclusive radius, doesn't just sprinkle in one spot
customer_reviews.text: I really like the weighted down base. I was spending WAY too much of my day dragging a hose from plant to plant in the garden and don't have an automatic watering system. This sprinkler solved the problem for being able to effectively reach multiple plants in various containers. It really has saved me HOURS of just watering by hand. I'm in Southern Arizona and sometimes, with the heat we've been having, I'd have to water twice a day. This little sprinkler is a God-send.
customer_reviews.author: Bimbeau

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised, adjustable spray patterns, decent fittings
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and chained them together for more coverage. Spray pattern and width is very good. Coverage can be adjusted by simply lowering the water pressure at the spigot which is convenient. The basic pattern is circular and is about 30 feet diameter at max water flow to the units. Construction is good. Don't weigh alot. Only issue I had was getting the units level on new sod - needed to prop one side up a bit get level. Overall, a pretty good product and ok value.
customer_reviews.author: GrayslakeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good sprinkler while it stays intact
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about a year now and I noticed when I turned it on a few months ago that there is a strong stream of solid water spinning upwards instead of sprinkling out circularly like it used to. There are little teal knobs that fit inside the holes in the black arms that spin when the water is turned on. Well, that little teal knob is nowhere to be found...it’s not like I drag the sprinkler upside down, and I’ve used it all of 15 times...so now I have a giant puddle where my sprinkler sits while the surrounding circle is gently watered.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for a Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: I just set it up this week but so far I’m very satisfied with it. It’s solid enough to stay in place but easy to pick up & move. It covers a large area (or smaller, depending on the water pressure). It’s especially good for broad areas. Maybe I don’t know how to adjust it but I wish I could make it water in the shape of a rectangle. But that’s just a personal need, overall I think it’s a quality sprinkler at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: Melinita

customer_reviews.title: Little sprinkler packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: This sprinkler is solid and well built. I like the smaller footprint, but that doesn't limit it's coverage area. If you need to cover a smaller area, you can turn down the water flow and this does not affect the sprinkler's performance. The 360 degree spinning action mimics rainfall which waters the area more thoroughly than the back and forth type of sprinkler. Because of the better saturation, you can run the sprinkler for a shorter period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Best sprinkler by far, loving it
customer_reviews.text: My house has never had sprinklers and we've bouht many yard sprinklers by far this one covers more area and evenly distributes more water , so I'm in love with this sprinkler . And going to be fun for kids to run and play . when it's hot ...thank you
customer_reviews.author: K10 kelli

customer_reviews.title: Love this sprinkler!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this and originally left a bad review over shipping,along with how the package came. I contacted them and they were so quick to make things right. They immediately sent me out a replacement. I have used this sprinkler now a few days and i absolutely love it!! It doesnt flip over from being top heavy. It has weights underneath to keep it in place. I will definitely recommend this sprinkler to friends & family!! The best sprinkler i have ever bought!! It also gets a good area of my yard when i am using it. Thanks Scooter's Inc for making it right and having such a great sprinkler!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Works Great but no directions for maintenance or use anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: The sprinkler works great, I bought 2, however there is no information either with the product or online for maintenance or use. I tried calling and e-mailing, but did not receive an answer to my inquiry. I tried using the QR reader and that told me there was no more QR Reader space available????? A video on the product needs to be put onto the website for proper maintenance and use.
customer_reviews.author: Mommajor

customer_reviews.title: Uneven distribution of water.  Can't trust this product to evenly water the grass.
customer_reviews.text: Sprinkler had a really uneven disruption of water. Around the base would be soaked because a couple of the heads barely shot any water out. Overall it does a pretty poor job of watering the grass. I received an email from the seller asking how I liked it and I responded, figuring maybe I got a bad one. I never heard back from the seller. Overall I am not very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: A Pinch of Pink

customer_reviews.title: Good for hills!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't need to water my lawn, but unfortunately it is above average on heat, on top of a prolonged dry spell. Fortunately this sprinkler ended up being a wise choice. It's wide base gives perfect stability on the sharp inclined hill that is my backyard. The water flow gives a wide diameter, mimicking rain. So far I am happy with my purchase, and my poor roasted lawn is slowly revitalizing itself.
customer_reviews.author: Taelune

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an Orbit tripod sprinkler that supposedly had 24 settings for over $40. It worked great if all I wanted to do was water 10+ feet away from the sprinkler. I couldn’t find an instruction guide to help so I turned to Amazon. Found this inexpensive sprinkler that does a great job of watering my newly seeded lawn. Water pressure determines the spread so it was simple to install and use. It does allow for some tweaking, so I changed one arm to go lower and left the other two arms upright. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Atchison

customer_reviews.title: Continuous Sprinkling In Full Coverage Area
customer_reviews.text: Easy to place, sturdy plastic, two nozzles settings for largest or smaller area, heavy enough to stay put. There’s something special about covering the whole area to be watered all at the same time, much different from oscillating sprinklers. You do have to turn off the water to reposition this sprinkler without getting wet. Otherwise it does a great job covering a large area depending on your local water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Stuendel

customer_reviews.title: It does a good job
customer_reviews.text: I have a large backyard and have been looking for a simple way to water it. Especially after the years of drought. I bought two of these, use two hoses and set them in the middle of the yard. I just run them twice a week for about a half an hour, move them three times during the half hour and it gets the ground saturated enough that the grass is now growing back after years of nothing but dry ground.
customer_reviews.author: roy

customer_reviews.title: Fragile - beware
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this sprinkler for spot watering on windy days. Had this one for about a year and a half. Dropped it on the grass and one of the arms broke off (see photo). I gave close to $50. for this first one - purchased another the other day thinking I could buy the rotating head to replace the broken one. No can do - they don’t sell parts - crazy since it is easily taken on and off. I won’t be purchasing another - also - made in China. Handle it like it’s made of glass and this one wasn’t even left outside when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: great little sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 of these to connect in series (2 on same hose) main reasons I chose these were the pass thru connection and circular spray patter works great no leaks at connections and tosses the water pretty far although the second in line is less powerful but that is to be expected all in all we dig these sprinklers going to have to buy a couple more for the front yard
customer_reviews.author: S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I've used it once, for several hours, so far. It does a decent job of even water spread, just don't expect it to create a quick soak. Set it and forget it for a while. The distance is easy to control with water pressure. One drawback relative to the style of sprinkler I was replacing is that you can't approach it to move it while it's on without getting wet. I didn't think of that until I was watching it and decided I wanted to move it.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: I didn't want it to be light weight!
customer_reviews.text: We live in West Texas where the wind blows almost constantly, so I needed a sprinkler that would spread water more laterally than vertically so as not to lose the moisture. I was hoping this one would adjust so that it was possible. the sprinkler works very well as it is designed. The base is weighted well and stays put. The water is spread in a wider pattern the higher the pressure, but is still more vertical than horizontal...so the search continues, lol..
customer_reviews.author: jojo b.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is my second GrowGreen sprinkler I bought to connect together. so it will give more coverage during the same time without moving my sprinklers so frequently. It is heavy enough to stay on the grass without slipping or toggling. I would recommend this to anyone. I’m using this at my home and do not know how it is working if you are using it for commercial use.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjaya

customer_reviews.title: Not enough control
customer_reviews.text: Not enough control over the way the water is dispersed. Water goes around in a 360-degree area, so if you want more control, you have to get one of those long sprinkler hose attachments with adjustments for the width of the spraying sidewards, and you can adjust for 180° spraying or just even less than 90° spraying. The other one is much better. Though this is of high quality. Depends on how you're going to use it, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Allie K.

customer_reviews.title: Worthy Sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Weighted handles keep on the ground no matter of grade. It has a solid 30-40' radius of spray. Tandem works well too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark O

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sprinkler!  Will not by any others!
customer_reviews.text: For years I've struggled to find the right sprinkler! After battling oscillating sprinklers, nozzles, etc., etc. -- I have found my sprinkler! Well packaged... well shipped... out of the box...worked like a charm. Strong, sturdy -- all other sprinklers are pitched -- have found the one I have been searching for to use! I'll likely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: After a single use, the top spinning part started to come lose when it was under pressure (aka whenever it was being used). This caused the spinner to slow down and eventually stop. You have to physically push it back together to get it to work, and then it's only a matter of time till the problem resurfaces. I would definitely spend my money on a higher quality product than this.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Lawn Care Made Easy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this sprinkler and tried it out today. It worked great. Gave good ground water cover. Light weight and easy to hook up. Durable. Covered alot of area for such a small sprinkler. I would highly recommend to anyone that needs a good sprinkler for those dry summer days. Also would be great to play in if you have kids.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl 24

customer_reviews.title: Good little sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: The weighted base is nice as is the ease of moving it around. It's sprinkling pattern is good and what we wanted. I would have given it 5 stars except that the spinning part seems like it might be fragile over time since sprinklers like this get manhandled getting moved around and changed. I would recommend it though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made and will certainly break
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these sprinklers two different times. Both broke. These sprinklers are poorly made and not worth your time. Consider buying anything other than this product as it is sure to break.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O. Langley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have the distance
customer_reviews.text: I like that it spins 360 degrees. But, it says for large yards and that it covers like 32 feet. That must be the diameter. Even then I don’t think mine is covering that much distance. I have a large yard that a 100ft long hose doesn’t reach the whole thing. So, I had hoped this would help. But, I’ll have to move it around the yard several times and still won’t get the coverage I need.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly inexpensive solution to our lawn watering problem. It is really easy to "install" and works really well. Have been using it for a couple of weeks and see no problems. Not sure of the longevity of the product, but even if I have to change it every couple of years, it still works out way cheaper than installing sprinklers.
customer_reviews.author: KayB

customer_reviews.title: Dancing in the rain.....
customer_reviews.text: ...that is because this sweet, little sprinkler takes on the mighty job of watering. It does a terrific job and pretty good coverage. The distance covered is determined by the force of water - which is the way it usually goes with sprinklers! I like this because I like the circular spraying for a broader, consistent watering.
customer_reviews.author: Wgtlifter

customer_reviews.title: Heads pop off
customer_reviews.text: Broke after first use. Black heads pop off when hose is turned on and will only work under very low water pressure. This also makes watering a larger area harder due to the decreased coverage area. Made of entirely plastic I recommend saving yourself the hassle and investing in a better quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Review

customer_reviews.title: Solid sprinkler with good coverage but limited settings
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to water a newly sodded lawn. At maximum, it covers about 40 feet in diameter. It's lightweight and easy to position. The heads can be rotated, but there are only 2 settings: straight up and about 30 degrees off from straight up. It's a good deal for the price, even if it doesn't offer a lot of flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: David Mandell

customer_reviews.title: Nozzles came off- useless 2 mo old
customer_reviews.text: The teal colored nozzle heads have all popped off rendering the sprinkler useless. I hope I can get a replacement because this is quite disappointing for a $20 sprinkler with good reviews. However as I view the one star reviews they have the exact same complaint as mine. Looks their product needs some revisions.
customer_reviews.author: Mzsharb

customer_reviews.title: One month in and its useless
customer_reviews.text: I initially rated the sprinkler at 5 stars as we liked the coverage area and its sturdy design. However, after only one month of use, it has stopped turning. I opened it and found a clear washer next to a rubber washer that has completely fallen apart. Now, I've gotten rid of the box and I'm stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: McNicholas

customer_reviews.title: Covers large area of yard
customer_reviews.text: No rain for a month so I finally ordered a sprinkler .Glad I chose this one as it is great .It attaches to the hose easily,covers a wide area when sprinkling and It is light enough that I can pull on the hose to move it to another spot while it,is still running.Even though it is lightweight it is stable when turned on.
customer_reviews.author: margaret anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Sprinkler - Gets job done
customer_reviews.text: Had been using sprinkler hoses to cover larger area still had to set timer and move to get area watered. I researched and found GrowGreen Sprinkler 360. LOVE this sprinkler, move 2x on lot 50x100 and done. I told my friend about it and she ordered 2, said she is going to order another (her husband took 1 for his garden)
customer_reviews.author: H ERVIN

customer_reviews.title: Works great but..
customer_reviews.text: They really have a great range and they’re light weight and easy to use. But I don’t recommend daisy chaining them like the say you can because it reduces the water pressure, therefore the range. I put two together and both had about half the radius that the did separately. Not really worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like that the sprinkler covers a lot of surface area. My only complaint is that I cannot approach it to move it to a different spot without either turning off the water or getting wet. A “rainbow” sprinkler allows me two seconds to approach without getting wet. But that comes with buying the style of sprinkler. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great Coverage and Output!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sprinkler, covers a large area and puts out a lot of water. Very happy with it. My only complaint is if you have to put it in an area between you and where you need to go, you'll get wet..... You can't wait for it to oscillate to one side and run, like side to side ones. BUT...... minor inconvenience, and I still highly recommend as it does a better job of coverage than the ones I've had that go side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars, except for one unforgivable problem:
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't spin. I start the water, it spins for 5 minutes or so, then stops. It still waters well, and sprays with a really good radius, but coverage stinks because it doesn't rotate. Can the manufacturer provide suggestions? I've tried lowering and raising the water flow - no effect. It's plastic, so i wouldn't expect to have to oil it, though i may try...
customer_reviews.author: NoahBotti

customer_reviews.title: Covers a lot of territory
customer_reviews.text: This sprinkler covers most of our yard--even with fairly low water pressure. The sprinkler covers, easily, a 20' radius. The unit has enough heft that it stays put. I wished I had ordered it when we first got the new sod because it would have saved me having to move the other sprinklers two or three times each time I watered the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Bike Rider

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work as Advertised for Me. Don't Recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from this and got even less than I expected. Coverage area was much less than 3600 sq. ft. reach is less than 15 ft or so from the sprinkler. Tried using multiple water hoses to see if was a flow issue. I went back to my old cheap oscillating sprinkler after using this for about 5 minutes. I would not purchase this again nor recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jared W.

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage.
customer_reviews.text: Plus: wide coverage, and tandem hook up (I bought two). Negative: purchased to replace earlier sprinkler. Teflon wear ring in sprinkler head wore out in two seasons. Tried to repair with an “O” ring, but too much friction to rotate correctly (hung up). Figured two units in tandem would reduce total watering time thus reducing wear on the Teflon wear ring.
customer_reviews.author: JC in Central Oregon

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars because...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and it works great! I gave it three stars because 2 days later I moved it from my yard to set it close to the house out of the way. My son's basketball hit it and now the sprikler head has broken off into two pieces. The base is solid but the sprinkler head itself is not that durable.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived I was leery. It seemed cheap and flimsy. We have used it for the last 3-4 weeks and it has held up great! Just be careful. Don't drop it or I can see it might crack. Otherwise I am very impressed with the quality of how it works. It spreads the water well and so far we haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole L Gearty

customer_reviews.title: Solid very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Not a flimsy plastic sprinkler. Center piece that spins is threaded and screws into base. Base is weighted stays in place but still easy to move. Can reposition just dragging some distance with hose. NO LEAKING. Working great, covers pretty large area, adjust by water flow from faucet.
customer_reviews.author: Sally CJ-7

customer_reviews.title: Functional and easy to deploy
customer_reviews.text: This sprinkler is lightweight and easy to deploy. It appears to be well made. It's light but doesn't feel flimsy. I'd like a little more maneuverability in the direction of the spray, particularly to be able to keep it lower and minimize overspray. Other than that, I'm pleased with my decision to purchase these sprinklers
customer_reviews.author: Havens

customer_reviews.title: Good sprinkler
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one first to see how if it served our needs, it was delivered on time, it was simple to install and use, the sprinkler works fine even with a little water pressure. It covers a large enough area on our front yard. I have since ordered a second one for the backyard and that works fine too. I just hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: K.Sally

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: looks nice seems sturdy and puts a nice trickle in the whole area of its radius that really sinks in well. Would be safe to run on small seedling plants because it is a gentle trickle but it definitely soaks in well in about 5 minutes. The radius isn't super super duper giant but I just do one run on the left side, then one run on the right side of my kind of big sized neighborhood yard and that soaks everything with an overlap in the middle too.
customer_reviews.author: Listen2God

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: It does not provide the coverage that it claims to; however, we have a townhome, with a standard small square townhome backyard area, and it is enough to cover that without having to move the sprinkler. It does appear to be weighted down so it won't move in the wind, which I do love, but you have to be careful if you have a wind up hose system to bring it back in so it does not pull too hard on your grass as a result.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Spins great
customer_reviews.text: It's more green in person than it looks online, so I am a little worried I'll loose it in the grass lol. But mechanically speaking it's very sound and light weight. My sure my pup will have hours of fun with it when summer comes around again. It also attaches to my hose no problem. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Happyhealthyhelping

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Enough to be Stable; Light Enough to be Manageable
customer_reviews.text: Have been searching for a rotating sprinkler to cover a large yard or just a corner, or for the kids to run through on hot days, as needed. This is perfect. It’s light enough to be manageable but heavy enough to be stable. I definitely recommend it and will hope to get another for my back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made!
customer_reviews.text: This one seems like it will last awhile and is very effective in covering a large area evenly. It has some weight to it which holds it in place nicely and feels of quality over the usual cheap plastic ones. I love that the nozzle are adjustable to widen or narrow the water path. Should get many years of usage out of this sprinkler.
customer_reviews.author: E. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: The best part is...
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast the product got here. Found the item to be just as described and excited about using it both for watering the lawn and doubling as a water activity for the kiddos. I like that this has the metal bars on the underneath for better support and won't be tossed around by the water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: H. Febres

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as ordered, very easy to attach to the hose, and very powerful at sending water over a large area. Nice and quiet too, but also sturdy enough that it doesn’t get thrown around by the force of the water despite how light it is. Very glad I bought this for our backyard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works very well, is stable, and even survived accidental abuse
customer_reviews.text: This works much better than our four previous sprinklers. It is stable, sprays a larger diameter pattern, and it even survived me accidentally hitting it with our high-rpm high-power string trimmer. I don't recommend doing that, but it still works perfectly. Oops. That mistake disassembled one of our previous all-metal sprinklers.
customer_reviews.author: RPL

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Updated *
customer_reviews.text: Works good! Nice big area is covers Update: one of the arms broke off when I was moving it! Was barely even touched. Kinda A bummer! Returned window has come and gone so I guess I’ll try and super glue 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: J. Debnam

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Took it out the box and put it together. Got some weight to it, so it will stay in one spot. The nozzles turn easily for which ever direction you would like to spray the water. Seems well made. Haven't tried it out yet. I plan on using this in my vegetable garden. It didn't come with instructions bit it's pretty self explanatory. It came with a washer but know where it goes or if it a extra. So far happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Woodrow-Downs

customer_reviews.title: Stopped spinning after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: So I thought it was okay, but the stem to connect to the hose is not long enough for me. I have large hands and find it difficult to attach. As of last weekend one of the 2 quit spinning altogether. All of the nozzles are spraying water but no spinning. Too expensive to only work for 6 weeks ! How could I recommend this? I would not!
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Good spray pattern, not for small areas
customer_reviews.text: This sprinkler has a good spraying range, I like that I can adjust the spray pattern. The only thing that I'm not too pleased with is that you cannot water small areas very well. The spray pattern is either too much or very little. It concerns me that the whole thing is made of plastic I am not sure how durable it will be. The sprinkler appears to be well made. I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa D

customer_reviews.title: Does what its meant to!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped super fast set up was easy just screw on the top then attatch your hose voila your watering your lawn! The spread is really good as well it covers my whole front yard from just the middle i dont know the exact sq ft but i have a medium size lawn. I would attatch a pic, but im waiting on my grass to grow lol!
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Castro

product_meta.title: GrowGreen Sprinkler, Rotating Lawn Sprinkler, Large Area Coverage Water Sprinklers for Lawns and Gardens
feature_bullets: POWERFUL & VERSATILE LAWN SPRINKLER: Give your yard maximum even water sprinkling with 80 PSI water pressure, 360 degree rotation, and 32.8 feet spray distance,

FULLY ADJUSTABLE SPRINKLER: Adjust the sprinkler nozzles to spray in any direction to customize your watering. The sprinkler base is weighted to keep the unit in place and ensure it doesn't move around.
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: Our sprinklers are made with high-quality ABS plastic and a rust proof polymer, this durable lawn sprinkler will provide long lasting, worry free performance.
SAVE TIME & WATER: This water sprinkler is super easy to use and takes seconds to setup. It also uses water conservation technology that delivers an even layer of water without over spraying.
MULTI-PURPOSE SPRINKLER: These versatile lawn sprinklers can be used as a fun sprinkler set for children to play and cool down in on hot and sunny days.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,073 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
